title._content: [Gen. U.S. Grant campaign button for 1868 presidential election] (LOC)

description._content: [Gen. U.S. Grant campaign button for 1868 presidential election] [1868] 1 photograph : round tintype ; 2.2 cm diameter (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Grant, Ulysses S.--(Ulysses Simpson),--1822-1885--Associated objects. Presidential elections--1860-1870. Campaign insignia--1860-1870. Format: Buttons (Information artifacts)--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32108 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2789
